selfIntro.title: Local supporter for Japanese travelers in India

selfIntro.subtitle: We provide travel and accommodation support in India for Japanese travelers, with services available in Japanese. I will be responsible for itinerary planning, local transportation, and communication during cultural experiences.
selfIntro.item1: Certified tour guide by the Ministry of Tourism, Government of India
selfIntro.item2: Holds a PAN India (all-India) tourism guide certification.
selfIntro.item3: Experience in handling tours throughout India: Approximately 3,500 participants in total.
selfIntro.item4: Hosting Japanese guests for homestays: Over 35 years (approximately 2,500 guests in total)
selfIntro.item5: 24 years of experience in import and export business between Japan and India

experiences.badge: Deeply experience Indian culture! A special trip with a homestay
experiences.title: Cultural Experience Information
experiences.description: Participation is not required. The program can be adjusted according to your preferences, health condition, and schedule. You will have the opportunity to directly experience India’s traditional culture and way of life, deepening your understanding of the journey.

card1.title: Ayurvedic Massage (Shirodhara)
card1.desc: This is an Ayurvedic treatment experience based on traditional Indian medicine. The details will be explained in advance.

card2.title: Indian home cooking experience (recommended for first-timers)
card2.desc: Experience Indian home cooking, a favorite in local homes. We'll also explain how to use spices and cooking techniques.

card3.title: Henna Art Experience (Henna Tattoo)
card3.desc: This is a henna art experience using plant-derived henna.

card4.title: Yoga Experience
card4.desc: This yoga experience will be tailored to suit your experience and physical condition. Even first-timers are welcome to participate.

card5.title: Experience how to wrap a sari (popular with women)
card5.desc: You can experience the basics of how to wrap (put on) a sari, a traditional Indian garment. This is a popular experience for those who want to commemorate their trip and enjoy taking photos.

tourism.title: If the standard tours aren't enough for you, customize your own Indian adventure with a tour!
tourism.description: If this is your first trip to India and you haven't decided on your destination or itinerary, we can help you. Based on your consultation, we will provide you with itinerary suggestions and guidance in Japanese, generally within 24 hours.

testimonials.title: Customer Testimonials
testimonials.description: These are comments from Japanese customers who have used our service. Many of these comments are from people visiting India for the first time.

items.name: Reiko
items.text: I met Verma 20 years ago and fell in love with India I would recommend a homestay with Verma's family to any beginner in India. Verma is one of the few governments certified guides who can guide you throughout India. Please feel free to contact Mr. Verma for any consultation regarding India, including Japanese, English, French, Indian, etc. interpretation and business coordination consultation.

items.name: Kazuyo Konaka
items.text: I have been staying with Verma's family for more than 10 years now. My job is to translate silk thread cloth and other fabrics to be made in India. He is very helpful when I ask him to do a lot of things, and they are always willing to help me find them. He understands the hearts of Japanese people very well. He is a grateful person.

items.name: Ms. Noriko Shinna
items.text: I was very anxious about my first trip to India alone, but I was able to enjoy sightseeing in India while staying at Verma's house with a homestay in a safe and comfortable environment.
